effects.name: Crosswarp
effects.description: Wave distortion crossfade with warping effect, perfect for high-energy music videos
effects.description_ko: 웨이브 왜곡 크로스페이드, 하이에너지 뮤직비디오에 적합

effects.name: Dreamy
effects.description: Soft blur transition with dreamlike quality, ideal for romantic and emotional content
effects.description_ko: 몽환적인 블러 트랜지션, 로맨틱하고 감성적인 콘텐츠에 적합

effects.name: Dreamy Zoom
effects.description: Dreamy transition with zoom effect for ethereal atmosphere

effects.name: Cube
effects.description: 3D cube rotation transition, professional and modern look
effects.description_ko: 3D 큐브 회전 트랜지션, 전문적이고 모던한 느낌

effects.name: Doorway
effects.description: Door opening reveal transition for dramatic entrances

effects.name: Pixelize
effects.description: Pixelation effect transition, trendy and digital feel
effects.description_ko: 픽셀화 효과 트랜지션, 트렌디하고 디지털한 느낌

effects.name: Glitch Displace
effects.description: Digital glitch displacement effect for edgy content
effects.description_ko: 디지털 글리치 효과, 엣지있는 콘텐츠에 적합

effects.name: Directional Warp
effects.description: Directional warping transition for dynamic content
effects.description_ko: 방향성 왜곡 트랜지션, 다이나믹한 콘텐츠에 적합

effects.name: Rotate Scale Fade
effects.description: Combined rotation, scaling and fade transition

effects.name: Doom Screen Transition
effects.description: Classic DOOM game style melt transition
effects.description_ko: 클래식 DOOM 게임 스타일 멜트 트랜지션

effects.name: Fly Eye
effects.description: Fly eye compound lens effect transition
effects.description_ko: 곤충 눈 복합 렌즈 효과 트랜지션

effects.name: Zoom In
effects.description: Ken Burns zoom in effect (100% to 105%)

effects.name: Zoom Out
effects.description: Ken Burns zoom out effect (105% to 100%)

effects.name: Vibrant
effects.description: Increased saturation and contrast for vibrant colors

effects.name: Bold Pop
effects.description: Bold text with quick pop animation

effects.name: Minimal
effects.description: Simple minimal text with subtle animation

effects.name: Light Leak
effects.description: Warm light leak effect that adds a dreamy, nostalgic atmosphere
effects.description_ko: 따뜻한 빛샘 효과로 몽환적이고 향수를 자극하는 분위기

effects.name: Bokeh Lights
effects.description: Soft bokeh light circles creating a romantic, magical atmosphere
effects.description_ko: 부드러운 보케 조명으로 로맨틱하고 마법같은 분위기

effects.name: Bloom Glow
effects.description: Soft bloom effect that adds a gentle glow to bright areas
effects.description_ko: 밝은 부분에 부드러운 빛을 더하는 블룸 효과

effects.name: Lens Flare
effects.description: Dynamic lens flare effect for energetic, cinematic moments
effects.description_ko: 역동적인 렌즈 플레어로 에너지 넘치는 영화같은 순간

effects.name: Soft Focus
effects.description: Gentle soft focus effect creating a romantic, vintage feel
effects.description_ko: 로맨틱하고 빈티지한 느낌의 부드러운 포커스 효과

effects.name: Cinematic Vignette
effects.description: Cinematic vignette darkening the edges for dramatic focus
effects.description_ko: 가장자리를 어둡게 하여 극적인 포커스를 주는 시네마틱 비네팅

effects.name: Film Grain
effects.description: Subtle film grain texture for authentic vintage feel
effects.description_ko: 정통 빈티지 느낌을 위한 미묘한 필름 그레인 텍스처

effects.name: Dust Particles
effects.description: Floating dust particles for nostalgic, vintage atmosphere
effects.description_ko: 향수를 불러일으키는 빈티지 분위기의 부유하는 먼지 입자

effects.name: Color Wash
effects.description: Trendy color wash overlay for stylized, modern look
effects.description_ko: 스타일리시하고 모던한 룩을 위한 트렌디한 컬러 워시

effects.name: Sun Rays
effects.description: Warm sun rays creating hopeful, inspiring atmosphere
effects.description_ko: 희망적이고 영감을 주는 분위기의 따뜻한 햇살

effects.name: Sparkle Effect
effects.description: Sparkling light effects for magical, glamorous moments
effects.description_ko: 마법같고 화려한 순간을 위한 반짝이는 빛 효과

effects.name: Anamorphic Streak
effects.description: Horizontal anamorphic lens streaks for cinematic look
effects.description_ko: 시네마틱한 룩을 위한 수평 아나모픽 렌즈 스트릭

effects.name: Moody Shadow
effects.description: Dark shadow overlay for moody, intense atmosphere
effects.description_ko: 무디하고 강렬한 분위기를 위한 어두운 그림자 오버레이

effects.name: Chromatic Aberration
effects.description: RGB split chromatic aberration for edgy, modern effect
effects.description_ko: 엣지있고 모던한 효과를 위한 RGB 분리 색수차

effects.name: Prism Light
effects.description: Rainbow prism light refraction for dreamy, artistic look
effects.description_ko: 몽환적이고 예술적인 룩을 위한 무지개 프리즘 빛 굴절

effects.name: Atmospheric Haze
effects.description: Soft atmospheric haze for dreamy, ethereal atmosphere
effects.description_ko: 몽환적이고 신비로운 분위기를 위한 부드러운 안개 효과

effects.name: Vintage Fade
effects.description: Warm vintage fade overlay for nostalgic, retro aesthetic
effects.description_ko: 향수를 불러일으키는 레트로 감성의 따뜻한 빈티지 페이드

effects.name: Light Streak
effects.description: Dynamic light streaks for energetic, exciting moments
effects.description_ko: 에너지 넘치고 신나는 순간을 위한 다이나믹한 빛줄기
